content: Hi, is there any way to join the Xena Project Discord? All links I can find are expired. @Kevin Buzzard Or is it just an Imperial College thing? Thanks.
I've messaged you an invite link!
Hi @Bhavik Mehta would you be able to send me the link as well? Thanks
Thanks!
It's supposed to be a young mathematician thing
I'm new to lean and would love to learn more. Could join the Discord server as well?
What's your background?
I'm looking for undergraduate mathematicians
I haven't attended college. I'm very much into programming and just recently started reading on real analysis, and Lean seems like an awesome intersection of interest.
can you do the first level of advanced multiplication world? I feel like we should say it's free entry for maths (or maths + X) UGs and everyone else has to pass some kind of test.
Yea I've been doing that up to functions today. No difficulties so far with those but I have some questions about lean types (like inductives and instances), and I'm more comfortable with Discord.

I'm wondering if joining the Discord server is still possible. I'm a graduate student at UMich and trying to learn Lean for the first time. The Zulip server is great, but I think maybe the Discord server is more suitable for very newbie questions?
You are very welcome to ask questions in either place! Maybe @Kevin Buzzard can send you an invite?
Sent!
@Kevin Buzzard Could you send me one as well?
What's your background? The discord is for undergraduate mathematicians interested in Lean.
I'd say that describes my background pretty well
@Hernan Ibarra
Can I get an invite as well? I'm also an undergraduate maths student
May I join too @Kevin Buzzard ? I'm an undergrad at Uni of Sheffield
Yes absolutely. Are you mathematicians?
I'm studying maths, yes

@Kevin Buzzard Greetings, Can I join the discord server even if I'm not an undergrad mathematician ?
I'm undergrad software engineering student, I'm interested in type systems, so I learnt Haskell. I'm learning lean as a dependently typed language, which is not supported by Haskell's type system. I would like to join the server, so that I have the chance to do some real projects. I started reading the hitchhikers tutorial, in case there is a required level of experience.
I am also an undergraduate math student who would like a link for the discord!

@Kevin Buzzard Hello, I'm new to Lean, and I'm interested in learning much further. Can I join the Xena Project discord server? I've just finished the natural numbers game a few days ago. However, I'm not an undergraduate student yet. I'm still in my second year in high school. Thanks
@Kevin Buzzard Hi, can I have a link to the Discord too? I'm technically not an undergraduate as I already have a degree and am no longer in formal education, but I'm still fairly young.
